modName: Push List of Skyrim Dwemer Mods
summary:
If you're like me and like all things dwemer, than you'll need no other explanation for why I have made this list. If you're not, than I tell you that it's a list with most if not all the
dwemer mods that I could find on Nexus. It gives you quick acces through links, to all the dwemer mods around, sorted out in categories.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/166/c/1/dwemer_by_candystrike-d7mhib1.png[/img]
REPORT ANY BROKEN LINKS SO I CAN FIX/REMOVE THEM!!

Details
========
Version: 1.0
Date: 16.02.2015
Category: Utilities
Author(s): Pushkatu
Source: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62727/?
Requirements: Microsoft Office 2003/2007 or OpenOffice

Description/ reason why I made this
==============================

If you're like me and like all things dwemer, than you'll need no other explanation for why I have made this list. If you're not, than I tell you that it's a list with most if not all the dwemer mods that I could find on Nexus. It gives you quick acces through links, to all the dwemer mods around, sorted out in categories. 

You can also check it here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KMhDQfEEszsI0EomZaFdTL4WNhgIwgOUTGdlULteLc0/edit?usp=sharing

Install
=======
Extract it's contents to your desktop( or any other location you want) and double click on the file.

Uninstall
=========
Just delete the file :)

Incompatibility
===============
!!!WARNING!!!Incompatible with trolls! If you are not a troll then you'll have no problems using it.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None!

History
=======
16.02.2015 - Initial release

Contact
=======
You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as 'Pushkatu'
You can find me on TESNexus as 'Pushkatu'
You can send me an email here: pushkatu@yahoo.com

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to all the modders out there that make Skyrim a better game.
Thanks to Skyrimnexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks....all.

Licensing/Legal
===============
I can't imagine using this anywhere else than Nexus, so what ever...
For now, I'm the only person authorized to modify this file. If you see this elsewhere, it's not mine.
Don't forget that each mod has it's own readme file or it should have.
Reading only this won't help at all when installing the mods.
Some of these mods might not compatible with each other so don't blame me if it'll scrue up your game. 
Some of these mods are not lore friendly, but are still amazing mods.
Some of these mods might require other mods in order to work properly, mods that are not listed here so once again make sure you read each mod's readme.
I did not create any of these mods so all the credit goes to the authors. All I did was to make this list.
author: Pushkatu
